text: Alfonso und Estrella (Alfonso and Estrella), D. 732, is an German opera with music by Franz Schubert, and libretto by Franz von Schober. It was composed on 1821-22 in Vienna. And later was first performed in Weimar, on June 24, 1854. ==Principal characters== * Alfonso - tenor * Estrella - soprano * King Froila - baritone * Mauregato - baritone ==Discography== * 1978: Peter Schreier (Alfonso), Edith Mathis (Estrella), Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau (Froila), Hermann Prey (Mauregato); Rundfunkchor Berlin, Staatskapelle Berlin, Otmar Suitner - (EMI Classics/Berlin Classics) * 2004: Rainer Trost (Alfonso), Eva Mei (Estrella), Markus Werba (Frolia), Jochen Schmeckenbecher (Mauregato); Coro e Orchestra del Teatro Lirico di Cagliari, GÃ©rard Korsten - (Dynamic) ==Sources== * The Complete Dictionary of Opera & Operetta, James Anderson, Wings Books, 1993. Category:1820s operas
title: Alfonso und Estrella
